This game is awful.

Play Deep Rock Galactic instead.

Pros:
1. The game itself always being updated/patched
2. Has an awesome content
3. Tutorial that explains main game objective
4. Fair matching up system
5. Killer side has different play styles
6. Lots of different perks/abilities

Cons:
1. Getting penalty for having unstable connection
2. Getting penalty for game bug that crashes you out of match
3. Chance of seeing toxic killers/survivors
4. Almost impossible to communicate with random survivors
5. Chance of getting left behind

Overall i recommend the game

Please save your money.

This game is so glitchy in so many aspects, it sells itself as competitive and casual at the same time. When played casually you just get frustrated from the ammount of meta being thrown in your face every single match and teammate incompetence. If you do barely well in killer you instantly get high MMR and start being matched against hackers and Meta Squads. If you get high MMR as a survivor you either get Hackers and Meta Squads for teammates and spent 3 minutes holding the right mouse button or you get shitty teammates that got into high MMR by being carried by Meta Squads and hackers and get camped by the killer on hook without having done anything in the match. If you are a fan of the Hellraiser franchise looking into getting this game, you'll find out that this is the ultimate Cenobite torture trap, play at your own risk.
very fun
fun
I got hella poosy after playing this

Unique game with several advantages. Overall the game is very intresting either as a killer or survivor
For someone beginner:
-As survivor you have to fix the gens in order to escape - otherwise find the hatch before the killer does if you are the last one standing
-Try to delay as much as you can the killer while the others are fixing the gens - or healing (and you hope they will fix the gens)

-As killer you have to kill as many as you can before they can actually manage to escape - or just being byllied by toxic main survivors

For someone new as well 
Dont buy DLCs very fast
Dont buy Skins with ingame money - Buy perks first - its more important the gameplay than just looking good
Dont give up if you straggle against the ranking up system or your MMR
As you play you learn and you become better
Play as killer and survivor to learn better the game - to see what killer sees and what feels to be on the ''enemy side''

For someone who plays a lot this game 
I strongly recommend the battlepass that this game offers - You actually give 10 euros (as i remember) and all you have to do is to play the game-missions and in the end you get free skins and points (worth 10 euros)

About this game - as in all games - there are some disadvantages such as
-MMR system is a huge problem here and years or the matchmacking. For example you might play against a full team, premades with 1000 hours in the game and you just got up to rank 1 killer (Rank I, in roman right now - new update)
-You might play with some survivors not as good as you would like to be so you have to carry up the game (which is not the games fault actually) [ i mean we all have our days ]
-The systems changes a lot, about the mmr system, about the items or the perks (sometimes is op to use, the next is useless so you have to change your favorite strategy)

But there are so many advantages
-New survivors and killer with new perks to play, new maps to learn and new skins to choose.
-Several events and free stuff for new players
-You have fun with custom games - or join full team against a random killer 
-You can have fun as killer killing a full team or random people (sometimes being on a team is not as good as it sounds)
-Easy matchmacking, almost in the same levels

What i would persnonaly like / dislike
-I would love to see something different even as an event. For example many people abandoned the game because you do the same thing every time - You fix the gens or die - You run or die - mostly its just fixing and looping the killer. A different object would be fine, or something to change a bit the gameplay

-I love the way you can swap perks between killers and survivors and use several strategies, items aswell, and having a friendly community (leave ggs after a game)

-I dont really like the fact in the perk store you can buy perks from the free killer-survivor. After playing 200 hours you have unlocked almost all the free to play perks from either survivor or killer, os every week you have a chanche to get 2 DLC perks to buy

To sum it up. I love this game and i strongly recommended to someone, mostly because as a survivor its funny to play with familiar people, while as a killer you are always solo. Also the prices for the DLCs are very good (while for skins are a bit expensive). Have fun and Thanks for reading. Hope you find this comment usefull!

The game has always been plagued by terrible problems and idiotic developers (wildly favoring survivors, making killer genuinely stressful to play, etc.), but now they're doing NFT shit, so they can right to hell.

So let's be real. The health has been shit for YEARS and constantly going down. With the only living competition being a fucking gacha game that also feels bad to play (Identity V) they really have no incentive to do anything about it. 

So where is this game now. With killer desync, stun/pallet validation, maps constantly being disabled with unreachable totems, a new hidden MMR system where one game can fluctuate you from new players to veterans and back one match from each other, and new rank system that requires far too much time to hit rank 1 for a small amount of BP that only rewards people who play hundreds on hours in a month and likely has all P3. I don't even remember all the garbage going on right now.

And now we got the fucking NFT partnered with @otogomes who is a far-right, 9-11 Truther, anti-vaxxer, who is losing the rights in MONTHS to the original creator who has no part of this. BHVR employees are claiming they were completely unaware their hard work was going into this shit. And now suddenly post from devs like @Spac3Hgh0s7_ saying "So um, completely unrelated to anything but unequivocally FUCK NFTs" are getting deleted.

If you can't be assed to care about your players, devs, or rightful content holders, why the fuck are we here?

EDIT: So the game is down after basic mechanics are causing soft locks and desync. Good patch. You managed to ruin the game more between PTB and release again. Here's videos so everyone can remember! 
https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=dI-85uIrVGI
https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=hBjQUqX6ZN8
Game's fine if you don't mind having your soul sucked everytime you log in.

The game itself is really, really good...but Behavior Interactive are just real scumbags and I'd hate to not recommend a game purely on the actions of it's developers, but I kinda have to.

4/10; Don't buy this game until Behavior gets it's act together.
